description: This file defines the interface for firewall-related objects and their configuration parameters within the COSA Data Model Library. It includes function declarations for getting and setting various firewall parameters, as well as for validation, commit, and rollback operations. The file appears to be part of a network management or device configuration system, providing APIs for firewall configuration management.

methods.name: Firewall_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves the boolean value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_GetParamIntValue
methods.description: Retrieves the integer value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_GetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Retrieves the unsigned long value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_GetParamStringValue
methods.description: Retrieves the string value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets the boolean value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_SetParamIntValue
methods.description: Sets the integer value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_SetParamUlongValue
methods.description: Sets the unsigned long value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_SetParamStringValue
methods.description: Sets the string value of a specified firewall parameter within the current context.

methods.name: Firewall_Validate
methods.description: Validates the current firewall configuration parameters before commit.

methods.name: Firewall_Commit
methods.description: Commits the current firewall configuration changes.

methods.name: Firewall_Rollback
methods.description: Reverts the firewall configuration to the last stable state.

methods.name: V4_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves IPv4-specific boolean firewall parameters.

methods.name: V4_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets IPv4-specific boolean firewall parameters.

methods.name: V4_Validate
methods.description: Validates IPv4 firewall parameters before commit.

methods.name: V4_Commit
methods.description: Commits IPv4 firewall configuration changes.

methods.name: V4_Rollback
methods.description: Reverts IPv4 firewall configuration to previous state.

methods.name: V6_GetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Retrieves IPv6-specific boolean firewall parameters.

methods.name: V6_SetParamBoolValue
methods.description: Sets IPv6-specific boolean firewall parameters.

methods.name: V6_Validate
methods.description: Validates IPv6 firewall parameters before commit.

methods.name: V6_Commit
methods.description: Commits IPv6 firewall configuration changes.

methods.name: V6_Rollback
methods.description: Reverts IPv6 firewall configuration to previous state.
